definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="67" w="277">This example will compare to number values. If they are true, then it will run whatever you add to the "do" section in the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">STRENGTH</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000000</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">REGENERATION</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000000</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">RESISTANCE</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000000</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
